de.bioforscher.singa.mathematics.graphs.model

Interface Graph<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,? extends Vector,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,IdentifierType>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeType - The type of the nodes in the graph.
    EdgeType - The type of the edges in the graph.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraph, AutomatonGraph, GenericGraph, MoleculeGraph, UndirectedGraph

    public interface Graph<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,? extends Vector,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,IdentifierType>
    The graph contains nodes connected by edges of a certain type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addEdgeBetween(EdgeType edge, NodeType source, NodeType target)
      Adds the given edge to the graph setting the given source an target nodes.
      int addEdgeBetween(int identifier, NodeType source, NodeType target)
      Adds an edge with the given identifier between the two given nodes.
      int addEdgeBetween(NodeType source, NodeType target)
      Adds a new edge between the source and target nodes to the graph using the next free edge identifier.
      IdentifierType addNode(NodeType node)
      Adds a node to the graph.
      boolean containsEdge(java.lang.Object edge)
      Returns true, if the graph contains the edge and false otherwise.
      boolean containsNode(java.lang.Object node)
      Returns true, if the graph contains the node and false otherwise.
      EdgeType getEdge(int identifier)
      Returns the node with the given identifier.
      default java.util.Optional<EdgeType> getEdgeBetween(NodeType source, NodeType target) 
      java.util.Collection<EdgeType> getEdges()
      Returns all edges.
      NodeType getNode(IdentifierType identifier)
      Returns the node with the given identifier.
      java.util.Collection<NodeType> getNodes()
      Returns all nodes.
      default int nextEdgeIdentifier()
      Returns the next free edge identifier.
      IdentifierType nextNodeIdentifier()
      Returns the next free node identifier.
      NodeType removeNode(IdentifierType identifier)
      Removes the node with the given identifier from the graph.
      NodeType removeNode(NodeType node)
      Removes the node from the graph.

        Returns:

      • addEdgeBetween

        int addEdgeBetween(int identifier,
                   NodeType source,
                   NodeType target)
        Adds an edge with the given identifier between the two given nodes. If an edge with the identifier is already present in the graph it is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier of the edge to be inserted.
        source - The source node.
        target - The target node.
        Returns:
        The identifier of the added edge.

      • addEdgeBetween

        int addEdgeBetween(EdgeType edge,
                   NodeType source,
                   NodeType target)
        Adds the given edge to the graph setting the given source an target nodes. If an edge with the identifier is already present in the graph it is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to be added.
        source - The source node.
        target - The target node.
        Returns:
        The identifier of the added edge.

        Parameters:

        target - The target node.
